lead_paragraph: The Cubs, who had been searching for a center fielder, agreed to a three-year, $15 million contract with the former Texas Ranger Marlon Byrd.
snippet: The Cubs, who had been searching for a center fielder, agreed to a three-year, $15 million contract with the former Texas Ranger Marlon Byrd.

headline.main: With Bradley Out, Cubs Bring In Byrd
headline.seo: With Bradley Out, Cubs Bring Byrd In
headline.print_headline: With Bradley Out, Cubs Bring In Byrd
